title: Single Of The Week: Twin Shadow – Castles In The Snow
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/TwinShadow3copyrightSamanthaWest_cropped-740x602.jpg "TwinShadow3copyrightSamanthaWest_cropped")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/3667-single-of-the-week-twin-shadow-castles-in-the-snow/attachment/twinshadow3copyrightsamanthawest_cropped)

For an artist that so quickly surged to critical acclaim, **Twin Shadow** has been somewhat absent from the pages of **Crack in the Road**. So it seems aptly fitting now to credit him with our single of the week. _Castles In The Snow_ taken from **Twin Shadow’s** debut record _Forget_, is as much a brilliant pop song as it is an abstract observational confession. Full of hauntingly majestic imagery, it clings to the brain after the first listen, with little blemishes of S**hadow’s** past being fully realised in front of us. One to watch, if you weren’t already. Have a great week. J

 [Twin Shadow – Castles In The Snow](http://soundcloud.com/hypetrak/twin-shadow-castles-in-the-snow) by [Hypetrak](http://soundcloud.com/hypetrak)
